mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO answer_tb ( name, type, img, result, update_date, problem_id ) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{img}, #{result}, #{updateDate}, #{problemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE answer_tb SET name=#{name}, type=#{type}, img=#{img}, result=#{result}, update_date=#{updateDate}, problem_id=#{problemId} WHERE answer_id=#{answerId}
mapper.select: SELECT answer_id, name, type, img, result, update_date, problem_id FROM answer_tb WHERE answer_id=#{answerId}
SELECT answer_id, name, type, img, result, update_date, problem_id FROM answer_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT answer_id, name, type, img, result, update_date, problem_id FROM answer_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay}
